jodd.madvoc.injector

Class ServletContextScopeInjector

  • java.lang.Object
    • jodd.madvoc.injector.BaseScopeInjector
      • jodd.madvoc.injector.ServletContextScopeInjector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ContextInjector<javax.servlet.ServletContext>, Injector, Outjector

    public class ServletContextScopeInjector
extends BaseScopeInjector
implements Injector, Outjector, ContextInjector<javax.servlet.ServletContext>
    Injects values from various Servlet contexts. It may inject:
    • raw servlet objects (request, session...)
    • map adapters
    • various values from servlet objects
    • cookies

        public void injectContext(Target target,
                          ScopeData[] scopeData,

        Injects just context.
        Specified by:
        injectContext in interface ContextInjector<javax.servlet.ServletContext>
        Parameters:
        target - injection target
        scopeData - all scope data for target's type (shared during context initialization)
        servletContext - injection source or any key for retrieving context

      • outject

        public void outject(ActionRequest actionRequest)
        Description copied from interface: Outjector
        Outjects some content from action request. Usually, action object fields values are stored as attributes.
        Specified by:
